Articles.Content:
This is more of a design competition.

Design the most "nice" hotel that can land on laythe for under 5,000,000 Kerbal dollars that can support 100 Kerbals. The top floor should be dedicated to science.

Rules

-Must be Stock

-Tweakscale allowed (Don't know why)

-Making History Allowed. 

Grading

- Have a side stairway/ ramp) allowing access to all the floors +5 Points. (+15 Points for a elevator)

-Have a lobby that a EVA Kerbal can walk into and enter the stair case + 5 points.

- Have 5 Floors of living space (+20 points Plus +5 points additional floor per floor)

-Have a cafeteria accessible by the lobby +20 Points

-General Feel it should look like a hotel not a battleships engine room. +20 Points

-Submissions Via Steam or pictures

-Windows at the 2nd top floor  (a Kerbal must not be able to fit through but must be able to see clearly) 

-Bonus Points if you come up with some amazing addition. 

 

You do do not need to launch it to laythe you can hack it their
